general.a: Sign up to receive your U.S. address. Use it when shopping online. Once your package arrives, we‚Äôll notify you and deliver it to Haiti.

general.q: When do I receive my U.S. shipping address?
general.a: Immediately after signing up, your virtual address will appear in your dashboard.

general.q: Can I receive packages from other countries (e.g., China)?
general.a: Yes! Your U.S. address accepts packages from any international seller that ships to the U.S.

payments.q: What payment methods do you accept in Haiti?
payments.a: We accept MonCash, Zelle, Cashapp, and payment receipts via upload.

payments.q: What if the store doesn't accept my Haitian card?
payments.a: Use our 'We Buy For You' service. We‚Äôll purchase the item and deliver it to you for a small fee.

payments.q: Can I get a refund for my deposit?
payments.a: Yes, contact support with your request and proof of payment.

customs.q: Do I need to fill out a customs declaration?
customs.a: No. Our team handles customs declaration based on the info you provide during submission.

customs.q: When do I pay customs fees?
customs.a: Once the package arrives in Haiti, customs or our delivery team will contact you if additional fees apply.

customs.q: Do I have to pay U.S. sales tax?
customs.a: We try to avoid U.S. sales tax by using tax-free addresses when possible, but some sellers still apply it.

tracking.q: How can I track my package?
tracking.a: Use the tracking number provided in your dashboard to track your shipment from the U.S. to Haiti.

tracking.q: What if my package was delivered to the warehouse but isn't in my account?
tracking.a: It may be missing your name or virtual address. Contact support with your tracking number and order screenshot.

tracking.q: Can I cancel a submitted package?
tracking.a: Yes, if the package hasn't been processed yet, you can cancel it from your dashboard.

location.q: Can I request home delivery in Haiti?
location.a: Yes, select 'Home Delivery' during submission and our Staff in Haiti will contact you for more

location.q: Can I edit my delivery location after submitting?
location.a: Yes, contact support quickly or resubmit the correct location before your package is shipped out.

security.a: Yes, we use encryption and secure practices to protect your information.

security.q: What happens if I forget my password?
security.a: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page to reset it via your email.
Email us or use the Need Help button in your Home Page for assistance.

prohibited.q: Can I ship electronics with batteries?
prohibited.a: Yes, but only if they‚Äôre inside the device and marked properly. Loose batteries are not allowed.

prohibited.q: Can I ship perfumes or nail polish?
prohibited.a: Yes, in small quantities and only through carriers that allow hazardous goods like DHL or FedEx.

about.title: Connecting Haiti to the World
about.intro1: Welcome to Bwat Lakay, a shipping and logistics platform created with one mission in mind: to bridge the gap between the global marketplace and the people of Haiti. Our service was born out of a deeply rooted understanding of the challenges faced by Haitians when it comes to shopping online, receiving packages, and accessing global commerce.
about.intro2: In a world where e-commerce is booming, Haiti has been left behind‚Äînot because of a lack of desire, but because of a lack of access. We're here to change that.
about.problem1: For years, individuals in Haiti have faced a unique set of problems when trying to shop or receive items internationally. Most people in Haiti do not have access to credit or debit cards, making it virtually impossible to shop on sites like Amazon, Walmart, or eBay.
about.problem2: Even those who do have access often struggle with unreliable shipping, expensive customs fees, or simply no physical address to receive packages. Haiti‚Äôs infrastructure doesn‚Äôt support direct-to-home delivery, and many homes lack official mailing addresses. Local shipping options are limited or unaffordable. For too long, people have had to rely on friends or family abroad‚Äîa solution that‚Äôs both unreliable and inconvenient.
about.solutionTitle: üì¶ Our Solution: A Smarter Way to Ship
about.solution1: At Bwat Lakay, we created a virtual mailbox and purchasing service tailored to Haiti. If you have a credit or debit card, you can use our app to submit your packages directly to our U.S. warehouse. Just enter your virtual address (e.g., HUB001-123456), include your phone number and tracking number, and choose air or sea, home delivery or pickup.
about.solution2: For users without payment cards, we built the ‚ÄúBuy For Me‚Äù service. Just tell us what you want, we‚Äôll confirm the price and a small service fee, and you can pay us locally. We'll handle the purchase and get it delivered to Haiti‚Äîno card required.
about.why: We are Haitians. We‚Äôve watched family and friends miss chances to work, study, or care for loved ones simply because they couldn‚Äôt get what they needed. This platform is our way of creating real economic opportunity. We want Haitians to have a reliable, secure, and affordable path into the digital world‚Äîso no one gets left behind.
about.vision: Commerce should be for everyone‚Äînot just people with a U.S. address or a Visa card. Our goal is to become the most trusted delivery and shopping assistant in Haiti. Whether it‚Äôs a book, a phone, school supplies, or household goods, we want every Haitian to know they can get it safely and affordably.
